short for
aromantic : not experiencing romantic attraction (= the feeling of liking someone romantically), or relating to people who do not experience romantic attraction : People who identify as aro can still have meaningful relationships. He coordinates a network of local ace and aro community groups. Compare
ace adjective (SEXUALITY) informal
More examplesFewer examplesI've been out as aro for almost a year now.As an aro-ace writer, she is particularly interested in stories about friendship.It's important to support aro folks who face stigma about their romantic orientation.Until I realized that I was aro, I wondered why I never had crushes.
short for
aromantic : a person who does not experience romantic attraction (= the feeling of liking someone romantically): I only date other aros like me. Aros can have any sexual orientation. Compare
ace noun (SEXUALITY) informal
